dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.para: This book is dedicated to each and every person in the free and open source software community. They work hard to create such wonderful software and technology and freely share it with others. They selflessly share their knowledge and expertise with us.
The efforts of all the programmers, designers, artists, documentation writers, bug fixers, and of course, the users, in creating such software and technologies is truly inspiring and amazing.
This book is also dedicated to my parents: Thank you, Mom and Dad, your unflinching support and trust makes me the man I am today.
This book is dedicated to my sister: Thank you dear Swathi, you are such a bundle of joy.
